Credibility • Expertise • Experience • Personalization • Unique Access • Passion for Travel & Service

For almost 30 years, Roadtrips has been creating and delivering custom sports travel experiences to the most sought-after and exclusive events around the globe. These bucket list vacations create lifelong memories for people, as they bring together two of our most desired pursuits: our love of travel combined with our passion for sport. 

When you travel with Roadtrips you are in good company…

American Express trusts Roadtrips. Roadtrips is an official supplier of the American Express Travel Network, participating in the Platinum Destinations® Vacations program, one of the exclusive travel benefits available to Platinum® and Centurion Card members from American Express.

Travel Advisors choose Roadtrips. Roadtrips is the leading choice of thousands of travel advisors and agencies worldwide. Roadtrips is the official sports travel provider to the Travel Leaders Network, Ensemble Travel Group, Signature Travel Network, Tzell Travel Group and Protravel International.

Top Hotels work with Roadtrips. Roadtrips is often the source for finding the best accommodations in “sold out” cities hosting major events. From Summer Games to the World Cup, Roadtrips’ host hotels dominate ‘Best Of’ and Gold Lists of the top travel publications.

The Roadtrips Difference…

  • Bespoke luxury travel experiences to the most popular domestic and international sporting events since 1992
  • Travel + Leisure 2013 A-List Member – Our Vice President, Duane Penner, cited as World’s Best Travel Advisor for International Sporting Events
  • Highly responsive and attentive service from time of booking through travel experience
  • Exclusive access to the most sought-after hotels, viewing options, amenities, parties, and other assets around the globe
  • Unique VIP access for discerning sports travelers
  • Completely customizable travel packages to meet your preferences, expectations, and budget
